Lucy Beauty Studio Story

Our highly skilled technicians and services focus on enhancing your natural beauty through the most advanced products and semi-permanent techniques available on the market. Our services include a wide choice of semi – permanent makeup options including brow techniques, lash extensions, skin care and tattoos. We also offer Henna brows, brow & lash tinting, brow lamination and waxing services.

Beauty Services Are Our Priority

At Lucy Beauty Studio, we are dedicated to helping you discover and enhance your natural beauty. With a team of skilled professionals and a range of services tailored to meet your individual needs, we are committed to providing an exceptional beauty experience. Whether it’s through our rejuvenating facials, precision waxing, or transformative lash and brow treatments, we are here to support you on your journey to looking and feeling your best.

What Clients Say

"Such a wonderful place! I was quite nervous getting lash extensions done for the first time recently. She did an amazing job! The staff i encountered were very sweet, too! I absolutely love my lashes and will 100% be coming back. Highly recommend. Very talented people. Beautiful studio as well :)"
Kendra Halliday
"Lucy was beyond sweet and professional. I had gotten Nano Brows done by her and I love, love, love them so much! I have gotten compliments on them and very happy that I don't have to do my eyebrows everyday anymore. I 100% recommend her for your eyebrows! You definitely won't be disappointed."
Ronni T
"Lucy Beauty Studio is my go-to for all my grooming needs. Their facial and body waxing service is top-notch. The staff is professional and friendly, and they make sure I'm comfortable throughout the entire process. I always leave feeling fresh and confident."
Emily
